sentences.english: When is it Safe to Reuse Cooking Oil?
sentences.chinese: 煎炸用油重复使用是否安全？

sentences.english: Good for salads, mixed with vegetables, fried fish, roast meat.
sentences.chinese: 适合于沙拉，拌凉菜，煎炸鱼类，烧烤肉类。

sentences.english: Some restaurants are beginning to use trans fat free frying oil.
sentences.chinese: 一些餐厅开始用不含反式脂肪酸的煎炸油。

sentences.english: The victim was then partially immersed in the liquid and fried to death.
sentences.chinese: 受刑人会部分被浸在液体中被煎炸而死。

sentences.english: The polar compounds in the frying oil can induce mutagenicity.
sentences.chinese: 煎炸油及其极性成分具有致突变作用。

sentences.english: It’s better to stew rather than fry food.
sentences.chinese: 所以炖煮的食物要比煎炸的好。

sentences.english: Heat up a skillet with oil until hot. Pan-fry the bean curd until golden brown.
sentences.chinese: 平底锅入油烧热，放入豆腐煎炸至金黄。

sentences.english: Frying in vegetable oil results in carcinogenic substances due to burned oil.
sentences.chinese: 在煮过的植物油中煎炸东西，会产生致癌物质。

sentences.english: Through the membrane filtering, the fried oil's quality has been improved and its life cycle has been increased.
sentences.chinese: 通过膜超滤提高了煎炸油的质量和使用周期。

sentences.english: French fries and Brussels sprouts, sir.
sentences.chinese: 法车煎炸的和布鲁塞尔芽甘蓝，先生。

sentences.english: The unique frying filter can have functions of coarse filtering and fine filtering.
sentences.chinese: 独特的煎炸油过滤器可实现粗过滤和精过滤两大功能。

sentences.english: Before you reuse liquid deep fryer grease, it should be strained to remove old crumbs and food particles.
sentences.chinese: 在重复使用液态煎炸油之前，应过滤除去食物残渣。

sentences.english: You will end up with fresh tasting and highly appetizing deep-fried foods every time.
sentences.chinese: 你将每次都能做出口感新鲜诱人的煎炸食品。

sentences.english: Moreover, total polar material of frying oil could be predicted by acid value and color.
sentences.chinese: 煎炸油极性值的变化可通过色泽和酸值进行预测。

sentences.english: Among them steaming and stir-frying are more commonly applied to preserve the natural flavor.
sentences.chinese: 其中蒸和炒煎炸较为普遍应用，以保存天然风味。

definition: to stir-fry with oil only (no addition of water)
to stir-fry/to do the cooking/stir-fried dish
to smoke/to cure over a wood fire
to stir-fry rapidly using a high flame/to conduct a media blitz/to manipulate a stock market through large-scale buying and selling
marinated/to make by pickling, salting or curing
